mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.test_data_main_id AS "testDataMain.ID", a.date AS "date", a.monday AS "monday", a.tuesday AS "tuesday", a.wednesday AS "wednesday", a.thursday AS "thursday", a.friday AS "friday", a.saturday AS "saturday", a.sunday AS "sunday", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN czz_aqpx_pxqk b ON b.id = a.test_data_main_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO czz_aqpx_pxqkdt1( id, test_data_main_id, date, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{testDataMain.ID}, #{date}, #{monday}, #{tuesday}, #{wednesday}, #{thursday}, #{friday}, #{saturday}, #{sunday}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE czz_aqpx_pxqkdt1 SET test_data_main_id = #{testDataMain.ID}, date = #{date}, monday = #{monday}, tuesday = #{tuesday}, wednesday = #{wednesday}, thursday = #{thursday}, friday = #{friday}, saturday = #{saturday}, sunday = #{sunday}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
